properties.name: spring.test.database.replace
properties.description: Type of existing DataSource to replace.

properties.name: spring.test.jsontesters.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration for JSON testers is enabled.

properties.name: spring.test.mockmvc.webclient.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration for MockMvc WebClient integration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.test.mockmvc.webdriver.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration for MockMvc WebDriver integration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.test.observability.auto-configure
properties.description: Whether observability should be auto-configured in tests.

properties.name: spring.test.webclient.mockrestserviceserver.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration for MockRestServiceServer is enabled.

properties.name: spring.test.webclient.register-rest-template
properties.description: Whether a RestTemplate bean should be registered for use in tests.

properties.name: spring.test.webservice.client.mockserver.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration for MockWebServiceServer is enabled.

properties.name: spring.test.webservice.client.register-web-service-template
properties.description: Whether a WebServiceTemplate bean should be registered for use in tests.

properties.name: spring.test.webtestclient.timeout
properties.description: Maximum amount of time to wait for responses.
